Jamie counted the number of edges of a cube, Jimmy counted the number of corners, and Judy counted the number of faces. They then added the three numbers. What was the resulting sum?\\
\\
$\textbf{(A)}\ 12 \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 16 \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 20\qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 22 \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ 26$
